Source code for maxaimodel.spark.timeseries.xgb_ts

import itertools
import pickle
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
from dateutil.relativedelta import relativedelta

import pyspark.sql.types as T
from pyspark.sql.functions import pandas_udf, PandasUDFType

import xgboost as xgb

from maxaibase.model.model_base import BaseModel
from maxairesources.factory.model_factory import ModelFactory



[docs]@ModelFactory.register_model("XGBForecaster")
class XGBForecaster(BaseModel):
    def __init__(self, spark_df, groupby_col, date_col, target_col, window_size, n_forecasts, params, num_round = 10):
        self.spark_df = spark_df
        self.groupby_col = groupby_col
        self.date_col = date_col
        self.target_col = target_col
        self.window_size = window_size
        self.n_forecasts = n_forecasts
        if params is None:
            self.params = {'objective': 'reg:squarederror', "eval_metric": "map"}
        else:
            self.params = params
        self.num_round = num_round


[docs]    def build(self):
        pass



[docs]    def get_params(self):
        return self.params


    def _fit(self, schema):
        params = self.params
        num_round = self.num_round
        groupby_col = self.groupby_col
        date_col = self.date_col
        target_col = self.target_col
        window_size = self.window_size
        @pandas_udf(schema, PandasUDFType.GROUPED_MAP)
        def fit_udf(pdf):
            # prepare data
            train_arr, label_arr, max_date, dt_frequency = DataPrep().prepare_data(pdf, date_col, target_col, window_size)
            
            # train model
            dtrain = xgb.DMatrix(train_arr, label=label_arr)
            trained_model = xgb.train(params, dtrain, num_round)
            output_df = pd.DataFrame({
                groupby_col: pdf[groupby_col].values[0],
                "max_date": max_date,
                "datetime_frequency": dt_frequency,
                "train_arr": [train_arr[-1]],
                "label_arr": label_arr[-1],
                "model": [pickle.dumps(trained_model)]
            })
            return output_df
        return fit_udf


[docs]    def fit(self):
        schema = T.StructType([
                T.StructField(self.groupby_col, T.StringType(), True),
                T.StructField("max_date", T.TimestampType(), True),
                T.StructField("datetime_frequency", T.StringType(), True),
                T.StructField("train_arr", T.ArrayType(T.FloatType()), True),
                T.StructField("label_arr", T.FloatType(), True),
                T.StructField('model', T.BinaryType(), True)
        ])
        self.model_df = self.spark_df.groupby(self.groupby_col).apply(self._fit(schema))


    def _predict(self, schema):
        groupby_col = self.groupby_col
        n_forecasts = self.n_forecasts
        target_col = self.target_col
        date_col = self.date_col
        @pandas_udf(schema, PandasUDFType.GROUPED_MAP)
        def predict_udf(model_df):
            grp_id = model_df.iloc[0][groupby_col]
            max_date = model_df.iloc[0]["max_date"]
            datetime_frequency = model_df.iloc[0]["datetime_frequency"]
            test_arr = model_df.iloc[0]["train_arr"]
            prev_pred = model_df.iloc[0]["label_arr"]
            model = pickle.loads(model_df.iloc[0]['model'])
            
            forecasts = []
            dates = []
            for i in range(0, n_forecasts):
                test_arr = np.append(test_arr[1:], prev_pred)
                test_arr = test_arr.reshape(1, -1)
                dtest = xgb.DMatrix(test_arr)
                ypred = model.predict(dtest)
                forecasts.append(ypred)
                current_date = DataPrep().increment_datetime(max_date, datetime_frequency)
                dates.append(current_date)
                max_date = current_date
                prev_pred = ypred
                test_arr = test_arr.reshape(-1, 1)
            forecasts = list(itertools.chain(*forecasts))
            output_df = pd.DataFrame({
                groupby_col: model_df[groupby_col].values[0],
                date_col: dates,
                target_col: forecasts
            })
            return output_df
        return predict_udf
    

[docs]    def predict(self):
        schema = T.StructType([
            T.StructField(self.groupby_col, T.StringType(), True),
            T.StructField(self.date_col, T.TimestampType(), True),
            T.StructField(self.target_col, T.FloatType(), True)
        ])
        forecast_df = self.model_df.groupby(self.groupby_col).apply(self._predict(schema))
        return forecast_df



[docs]    def save(self, path):
        self.model_df.write.mode('overwrite').parquet(path)

    

[docs]    def load(self, path):
        self.model_df = spark.read.parquet(path)



[docs]    def get_model_diagnostics(self):
        pass




[docs]class DataPrep(object):
    def __init__(self):
        pass


[docs]    @staticmethod
    def prepare_data(pdf, date_col, target_col, window_size):
        max_training_date = pdf[date_col].max()
        dt_frequency = DataPrep().infer_frequency(pdf[[date_col, target_col]], date_col)
        np_arr = pdf[target_col].to_numpy()
        train_arr = []
        label_arr = []
        for i in range(window_size, len(np_arr)):
            feature_arr = np_arr[i-window_size:i]
            label = np_arr[i]
            train_arr.append(feature_arr)
            label_arr.append(label)
        train_arr = np.array(train_arr)
        label_arr = np.array(label_arr)
        label_arr = label_arr.reshape(-1, 1)
        
        return train_arr, label_arr, max_training_date, dt_frequency



[docs]    @staticmethod
    def infer_frequency(df, date_col):
        """
        infer_frequency(df, date_col="date")
        """
        frequency_codes_dict = {
            "T": "minute", 
            "H": "hourly",
            "D": "daily",
            "W": "weekly",
            "M": "monthly",
            "A": "yearly"
        }
        freq_df = df.set_index(date_col)
        freq = pd.infer_freq(freq_df.index)
        if freq is not None:
            return frequency_codes_dict.get(freq[0], None)
        else:
            return None

        

[docs]    @staticmethod
    def increment_datetime(datetime, frequency, interval=1):
        if frequency == "minute":
            datetime = datetime + relativedelta(minutes=interval)
        elif frequency == "hourly":
            datetime = datetime + relativedelta(hours=interval)
        elif frequency == "daily":
            datetime = datetime + relativedelta(days=interval)
        elif frequency == "weekly":
            datetime = datetime + relativedelta(weeks=interval)
        elif frequency == "monthly":
            datetime = datetime + relativedelta(months=interval)
        elif frequency == "yearly":
            datetime = datetime + relativedelta(years=interval)
        else:
            raise ValueError("wrong frequency passed")
        return datetime
